entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RangeAttribute double parsing issue with hungarian culture #109672
    Future
  • BigInteger correctness regression from .NET 8 #109669
    9.0.x
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute fails to access volatile field #109665
  • C++/CLI 4.7.2 System::Text::Json System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence undefined #109664

Closed

  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_Delete_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_File_Delete_InNestedDirectory #103549
    Future
  • C# Collections for docs #90463
    Future
  • Issue with new X509CertificateLoader #109007
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Warn on use of StreamReader.EndOfStream in async methods #98834
    10.0.0
  • TaskCompletionSource performance #109662
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is not working with some camel case properties. Example: uMLDesign #109663
  • PI is wrong #109666

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the condition to exclude only native shared libs #109676
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Revert "Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg" #109675
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: tail merge returns with multiple statements #109670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable tail merge for try exits #109661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary StreamReader.EndOfStream call from NetworkInformation #109631
    area-System.Net
  • Update trimmer attributes for `ComActivator` #109655
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix upload conflict Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref in official build #109650
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove CoreCLR PAL's InternalNew/Delete and just use new/delete with std::nothrow #109659
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check input length for empty when decrypting with padding #109660
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
